roleOverview: Digital Marketers drive brand growth using SEO, paid campaigns, content strategy, social media, and analytics across digital channels.
requiredSkills: Paid ads across search and social platforms
beginnerStage: Learn digital marketing fundamentals and channel basics
Run small campaigns and track CTR, CPC, and conversion rates
Create content calendars and execute platform-specific posts
intermediateStage: Manage multi-channel campaigns with segmented audiences
Build funnel analysis and optimize landing pages
Use analytics tools for reporting and performance improvements
advancedStage: Lead growth strategy and budget allocation across channels
Design experimentation frameworks for CAC and LTV optimization
Scale brand, performance, and lifecycle marketing programs
realWorldProjects: Lead generation funnel optimization for B2B SaaS
Content + SEO strategy for organic traffic growth
salaryInsights: Compensation scales with revenue impact, campaign efficiency, and ability to optimize acquisition and retention outcomes.
